Fashionable Marine

In the Indian Ocean in yemen coastal, stands a magic island, socotra islands. The island and the mainland plate has been isolated, long-term 1800 geographical isolation created many only exists in the island of plants and animals. In socotra islands 825, 37 percent plant species are endemic, 90% of reptiles and 95 percent of the snail is unique island. The rare creature because of its many varieties, therefore considered "the Galapagos islands in the Indian Ocean.

Located along the coast of the Indian Ocean in yemen, socotra islands have the world's most amazing and peculiar plant species. More than 800 species of plants in the island, with more than 1/3 species is the peculiar, no distribution in other places. The Galapagos islands belongs to an eastern Pacific melon, more than three currents of interchange, and the giant turtle with exotic animals, such famous called "living biological evolution museum" and "Marine biological melting pot".

Fashionable stimulate festival

Another time, most young people like Halloween is coming. The theme of the festival with demons, with its unique pumpkins, terrorist look fashionable, all sorts of funny stimulation of the global game has become the people relax one of the best ways Moncler down

Britain is the birthplace of Halloween. In the 5th century BC, when the celtics will live in Ireland for late October 31, symbol of the end of the year. The celtics as the target of ghost, become the fire went home, wearing grotesque scary masks and dressed as a ghost appearance together in the street who swam to drive a ghost. Gradually, these traditions evolved into today's young people enjoy celebration, people in this evening dress up as ghosts, a happy holiday. Cheap moncler

Fashionable concept of environmental protection

In recent years the known as "soft gold" material rising food, but because of cashmere goats are eating grass roots to eat together, passes through plajavascript://ce "under", multiply the goat for environmental protection, in fact also has a lot of damage. And Cotton, 100% Cotton is often as "environmental protection" clothing symbol, this also is an error, large-scale production of Cotton planting as having very not environmental protection of place, those cheap Cotton cloth, usually means a lot of chemical fertilizers and pesticides on land pollution, in comparison, Organic Cotton (Organic Cotton) production process, it is not adopted environmental many transgenic technology, need not fertilizers and pesticides, but output but lower than traditional Cotton output, and finally on 14-33 the clothing that makes the price will make ordinary consumers to accept: a Levi 's of Organic Cotton jeans, than ordinary Cotton expensive on about five times, choose the former consumers in addition to buy fashionable, but also is in for environmental protection buried list. Moncler Jackets

To understand fiber raw material production process to the environmental pollution degree, is just the beginning. Need synthetic fiber, in synthetic process whether energy consumption? Fiber in the machining process (especially dyeing, finishing) whether to use avirulent, biodegradable material? Fiber consumption after use, can because of abandoned or processing bring environmental problems? Men Moncler Jackets

Fashionable emotional appeal

IT Mischa Barton girl is always all fashionable vane, former days she 'Tartan short skirt to attend an activity, if not the hand that l torn, regular meeting lets people make the mistake of thinking that is summer. Moncler Down
Similarly, Beyonce little sister Solange recently also is such a thing without belt skirt outfit.
Said Tartan was Scottish totem too far, because each Scots were using it to the world proclaim his own family. Tartan in Scotland language is "squares inside wool" means.
Because the Scot was initially based on family unit for life, hence, every family internal are slowly formed its own unique grid pattern. This notion didn't over time passes, it has been reserved for millennia, each kind of lattice ZiWen behind represents a family of existence. Moncler UK

Fashion consumption

This is really a big good news, Hermes to in our China creates a new brand, brand name "Shang be". This is not a Hermes buy domestic potential brand, but for the first time in the name of the group, established in China a brand new, and in-depth Chinese culture, from design and management team is adopted by the Chinese artist. Moncler Down
Shang include clothing, accessories, be with other domestic act the role ofing were brand, production materials will adopt made in China, localization quite thoroughly. Moncler Jackets

We always complaining about why China haven't produce a real sense of luxury brands, but we also know this is required the fashion industry mature development can foster up a local luxury brands, China's current situation hasn't arrived that stage, although now domestic has so many brands is being developed. Yet China's luxury consumer market is vigorously develop center, in the global market, it is the most significance of luxury brands that a market, because China's rich strata, the middle class are kept growing among the consumption of luxury ability let the world, surprised. 2009 Chinese luxury consumption accounted for global market share as much as 27.5%, estimated in the future five years, Chinese luxury market will reach $146 billion, occupy the first global luxury consumption. In Europe and the consumer still the wu tight purse, Chinese high-grade consumption already appeared a blowout, global quarter luxuries by Chinese guests bought from you.

Moncler sale

Noon come here to eat a sunshine lunch, then to stroll continual characteristic shop, you can always cleans out those different things, I ever bought several deputy manual frames, still fondle admiringly, actually those potty little store hides great designers classic, it is only with the heart also spend time person to really feel this area of shopping pleasure. Fashion trail

And Nathan, so today most trekking in San Diego way most people not because of religious reasons, the more people is to bring the trip to trek as challenges self intensepressure. And people chooses to trek way except hiking, riding a bicycle riding and ride donkey is said to have.
As we are always taking the car ChongZou pilgim road, not real pilgrims. Arriving on the muddy track trail before, on a highway in the three cycling "pilgrimage" guy for us Shouting: "San Diego is coming. Buen Camino!" "Buen Camino" actually and Chinese "bon voyage" meaning of similar products. Allegedly, for a long time, people in San Diego road meet will mutual way "Buen Camino", no matter where you come from, everyone with the sentence, encouraging mutual greeting or saying good-bye.
